TopicTitle: How can I get the time warp warning message back?

Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm back since long time haven't played and I can't remember how to get back that message when you click on don't show again. Any ideas?

Thanks!

InF3RNo.

Edited May 19, 2014 by InF3RNo

What messages?

The 3x physics warp message?

Why do you need it, if you already know off the warning?
In the settings.cfg of your main KSP folder install, Ctrl-F "SHOW_PWARP_WARNING" and change it to True.

What messages?

The 3x physics warp message?

Why do you need it, if you already know off the warning?

I don't remember when it was altering the ship, played long time ago and all knowledged fled.

In the settings.cfg of your main KSP folder install, Ctrl-F "SHOW_PWARP_WARNING" and change it to True.

Thanks!
